verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

דַּבֵּ֞ר <S%H1696><s%> dab-Ber Speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to בְּנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-mar-Ta and say אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Hem, about אִ֕ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish unto them When a man כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki When יַפְלִ֖א <S%H6381><s%> yaf-Li shall make a singular נֶ֑דֶר <S%H5088><s%> Ne-der; vow בְּעֶרְכְּךָ֥ <S%H6187><s%> be-'er-ke-Cha by thy estimation נְפָשֹׁ֖ת <S%H5315><s%> ne-fa-Shot the persons לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. [shall be] for the LORD

וְהָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah become עֶרְכְּךָ֙ <S%H6187><s%> 'er-ke-Cha And thy estimation הַזָּכָ֔ר <S%H2145><s%> haz-za-Char, shall be of the male מִבֶּן֙ <S%H1121><s%> mib-Ben old עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim from twenty שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah, years וְעַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> ve-'Ad against בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- old שִׁשִּׁ֣ים <S%H8346><s%> shish-Shim even unto sixty שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah; years וְהָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah then עֶרְכְּךָ֗ <S%H6187><s%> 'er-ke-Cha, even thy estimation חֲמִשִּׁ֛ים <S%H2572><s%> cha-mish-Shim shall be fifty שֶׁ֥קֶל <S%H8255><s%> She-kel shekels כֶּ֖סֶף <S%H3701><s%> Ke-sef of silver בְּשֶׁ֥קֶל <S%H8255><s%> be-She-kel after the shekel הַקֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <S%H6944><s%> hak-Ko-desh. of the sanctuary

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> ve-'im- if נְקֵבָ֖ה <S%H5347><s%> ne-ke-Vah And if it [be] a female הִ֑וא <S%H1931><s%> hi he וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah then עֶרְכְּךָ֖ <S%H6187><s%> 'er-ke-Cha then thy estimation שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <S%H7970><s%> she-lo-Shim shall be thirty שָֽׁקֶל׃ <S%H8255><s%> Sha-kel. shekels

וְאִ֨ם <S%H518><s%> ve-'Im If מִבֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> mib-ben- old חָמֵ֜שׁ <S%H2568><s%> cha-Mesh And if [it be] from five שָׁנִ֗ים <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nim, years וְעַד֙ <S%H5704><s%> ve-'Ad against בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- old עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim even unto twenty שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah, years וְהָיָ֧ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah then עֶרְכְּךָ֛ <S%H6187><s%> 'er-ke-Cha then thy estimation הַזָּכָ֖ר <S%H2145><s%> haz-za-Char shall be of the male עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim twenty שְׁקָלִ֑ים <S%H8255><s%> she-ka-Lim; shekels וְלַנְּקֵבָ֖ה <S%H5347><s%> ve-lan-ne-ke-Vah and for the female עֲשֶׂ֥רֶת <S%H6235><s%> 'a-Se-ret ten שְׁקָלִֽים׃ <S%H8255><s%> she-ka-Lim. shekels

וְאִ֣ם <S%H518><s%> ve-'Im if מִבֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> mib-ben- old חֹ֗דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> Cho-desh, And if [it be] from a month וְעַד֙ <S%H5704><s%> ve-'Ad against בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- old חָמֵ֣שׁ <S%H2568><s%> cha-Mesh even unto five שָׁנִ֔ים <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nim, years וְהָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah then עֶרְכְּךָ֙ <S%H6187><s%> 'er-ke-Cha then thy estimation הַזָּכָ֔ר <S%H2145><s%> haz-za-Char, shall be of the male חֲמִשָּׁ֥ה <S%H2568><s%> cha-mish-Shah five שְׁקָלִ֖ים <S%H8255><s%> she-ka-Lim shekels כָּ֑סֶף <S%H3701><s%> Ka-sef; of silver וְלַנְּקֵבָ֣ה <S%H5347><s%> ve-lan-ne-ke-Vah and for the female עֶרְכְּךָ֔ <S%H6187><s%> 'er-ke-Cha, thy estimation שְׁלֹ֥שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> she-Lo-shet [shall be] three שְׁקָלִ֖ים <S%H8255><s%> she-ka-Lim shekels כָּֽסֶף׃ <S%H3701><s%> Ka-sef. of silver

וְ֠אִם <S%H518><s%> Ve-'im If מִבֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> mib-ben- old שִׁשִּׁ֨ים <S%H8346><s%> shish-Shim And if [it be] from sixty שָׁנָ֤ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah years וָמַ֙עְלָה֙ <S%H4605><s%> va-Ma'-lah and above אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- if זָכָ֔ר <S%H2145><s%> za-Char, if [it be] a male וְהָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah then עֶרְכְּךָ֔ <S%H6187><s%> 'er-ke-Cha, then thy estimation חֲמִשָּׁ֥ה <S%H2568><s%> cha-mish-Shah fif עָשָׂ֖ר <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar teen שָׁ֑קֶל <S%H8255><s%> Sha-kel; shekels וְלַנְּקֵבָ֖ה <S%H5347><s%> ve-lan-ne-ke-Vah and for the female עֲשָׂרָ֥ה <S%H6235><s%> 'a-sa-Rah ten שְׁקָלִֽים׃ <S%H8255><s%> she-ka-Lim. shekels

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> ve-'im- if מָ֥ךְ <S%H4134><s%> mach But if he be poorer הוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> hu he מֵֽעֶרְכֶּ֔ךָ <S%H6187><s%> me-'er-Ke-cha, than thy estimation וְהֶֽעֱמִידוֹ֙ <S%H5975><s%> ve-he-'e-mi-Do then he shall present לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei himself before הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen, the priest וְהֶעֱרִ֥יךְ <S%H6186><s%> ve-he-'e-Rich shall value אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To הַכֹּהֵ֑ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen; and the priest עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- according פִּ֗י <S%H6310><s%> Pi, him according to אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after תַּשִּׂיג֙ <S%H5381><s%> tas-Sig ability יַ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> yad who הַנֹּדֵ֔ר <S%H5087><s%> han-no-Der, that vowed יַעֲרִיכֶ֖נּוּ <S%H6186><s%> ya-'a-ri-Chen-nu value הַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen. shall the priest ס sa-Mek

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> ve-'im- now if בְּהֵמָ֔ה <S%H929><s%> be-he-Mah, And if [it be] a beast אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which יַקְרִ֧יבוּ <S%H7126><s%> yak-Ri-vu whereof men bring מִמֶּ֛נָּה <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nah as קָרְבָּ֖ן <S%H7133><s%> kor-ban an offering לַֽיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; unto the LORD כֹּל֩ <S%H3605><s%> kol any אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher such יִתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> yit-Ten all that [any man] giveth מִמֶּ֛נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu at לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of such unto the LORD יִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> yih-yeh- become קֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <S%H6944><s%> Ko-desh. shall be holy

לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo shall not יַחֲלִיפֶ֗נּוּ <S%H2498><s%> ya-cha-li-Fen-nu, He shall not alter וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- or יָמִ֥יר <S%H4171><s%> ya-Mir it nor change אֹת֛וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To ט֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov it a good בְּרָ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> be-Ra' for a bad אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> 'ov- or רַ֣ע <S%H7451><s%> ra' or a bad בְּט֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> be-Tov; for a good וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> ve-'im- if הָמֵ֨ר <S%H4171><s%> ha-Mer and if he shall at all יָמִ֤יר <S%H4171><s%> ya-Mir change בְּהֵמָה֙ <S%H929><s%> be-he-Mah beast בִּבְהֵמָ֔ה <S%H929><s%> biv-he-Mah, for beast וְהָֽיָה־ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-yah- shall become ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu and its וּתְמוּרָת֖וֹ <S%H8545><s%> u-te-mu-ra-To then it and the exchange יִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> yih-yeh- shall become קֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <S%H6944><s%> Ko-desh. thereof shall be holy

וְאִם֙ <S%H518><s%> ve-'Im If כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- is any בְּהֵמָ֣ה <S%H929><s%> be-he-Mah beast טְמֵאָ֔ה <S%H2931><s%> te-me-'Ah, And if [it be] any unclean אֲ֠שֶׁר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not יַקְרִ֧יבוּ <S%H7126><s%> yak-Ri-vu of which they do not offer מִמֶּ֛נָּה <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nah as קָרְבָּ֖ן <S%H7133><s%> kor-ban a sacrifice לַֽיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; unto the LORD וְהֶֽעֱמִ֥יד <S%H5975><s%> ve-he-'e-Mid then he shall present אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַבְּהֵמָ֖ה <S%H929><s%> hab-be-he-Mah the beast לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before הַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen. the priest

וְהֶעֱרִ֤יךְ <S%H6186><s%> ve-he-'e-Rich shall value הַכֹּהֵן֙ <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen And the priest אֹתָ֔הּ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tah, בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> bein it whether ט֖וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov it be good וּבֵ֣ין <S%H996><s%> u-Vein or רָ֑ע <S%H7451><s%> Ra'; bad כְּעֶרְכְּךָ֥ <S%H6187><s%> ke-'er-ke-Cha as thou valuest הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen it [who art] the priest כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> ken so יִהְיֶֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh. become

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> ve-'im- if גָּאֹ֖ל <S%H1350><s%> ga-'Ol But if he will at all יִגְאָלֶ֑נָּה <S%H1350><s%> yig-'a-Len-nah; redeem וְיָסַ֥ף <S%H3254><s%> ve-ya-Saf it then he shall add חֲמִישִׁת֖וֹ <S%H2549><s%> cha-mi-shi-To a fifth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- of עֶרְכֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H6187><s%> 'er-Ke-cha. [part] thereof unto thy estimation

וְאִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ve-'Ish, And when a man כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- now if יַקְדִּ֨שׁ <S%H6942><s%> yak-Dish shall sanctify אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בֵּית֥וֹ <S%H1004><s%> bei-To his house קֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <S%H6944><s%> ko-desh [to be] holy לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, unto the LORD וְהֶעֱרִיכוֹ֙ <S%H6186><s%> ve-he-'e-ri-Cho shall estimate הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen, then the priest בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> bein either ט֖וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov it whether it be good וּבֵ֣ין <S%H996><s%> u-Vein or רָ֑ע <S%H7451><s%> Ra'; or bad כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after יַעֲרִ֥יךְ <S%H6186><s%> ya-'a-Rich shall estimate אֹת֛וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen as the priest כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> ken so יָקֽוּם׃ <S%H6965><s%> ya-Kum. it so shall it stand

וְאִ֨ם־ <S%H518><s%> ve-'Im- if הַמַּקְדִּ֔ישׁ <S%H6942><s%> ham-mak-Dish, And if he that sanctified יִגְאַ֖ל <S%H1350><s%> yig-'Al it will redeem אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בֵּית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> bei-To; his house וְ֠יָסַף <S%H3254><s%> Ve-ya-saf then he shall add חֲמִישִׁ֧ית <S%H2549><s%> cha-mi-Shit the fifth כֶּֽסֶף־ <S%H3701><s%> ke-sef- [part] of the money עֶרְכְּךָ֛ <S%H6187><s%> 'er-ke-Cha of thy estimation עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav and וְהָ֥יָה <S%H1961><s%> ve-Ha-yah become לֽוֹ׃ lo.

וְאִ֣ם׀ <S%H518><s%> ve-'Im if מִשְּׂדֵ֣ה <S%H7704><s%> mis-se-Deh [some part] of a field אֲחֻזָּת֗וֹ <S%H272><s%> a-chuz-za-To, of his possession יַקְדִּ֥ישׁ <S%H6942><s%> yak-Dish shall sanctify אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> 'ish And if a man לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, unto the LORD וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah then עֶרְכְּךָ֖ <S%H6187><s%> 'er-ke-Cha then thy estimation לְפִ֣י <S%H6310><s%> le-Fi shall be according זַרְע֑וֹ <S%H2233><s%> zar-'O; to the seed זֶ֚רַע <S%H2233><s%> Ze-ra' seed חֹ֣מֶר <S%H2563><s%> Cho-mer thereof an homer שְׂעֹרִ֔ים <S%H8184><s%> se-'o-Rim, of barley בַּחֲמִשִּׁ֖ים <S%H2572><s%> ba-cha-mish-Shim [shall be valued] at fifty שֶׁ֥קֶל <S%H8255><s%> She-kel shekels כָּֽסֶף׃ <S%H3701><s%> Ka-sef. of silver

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If מִשְּׁנַ֥ת <S%H8141><s%> mish-she-Nat from the year הַיֹּבֵ֖ל <S%H3104><s%> hai-yo-Vel of jubile יַקְדִּ֣ישׁ <S%H6942><s%> yak-Dish If he sanctify שָׂדֵ֑הוּ <S%H7704><s%> sa-De-hu; his field כְּעֶרְכְּךָ֖ <S%H6187><s%> ke-'er-ke-Cha according to thy estimation יָקֽוּם׃ <S%H6965><s%> ya-Kum. it shall stand
